Samples.Title: Image Classification
Samples.DescriptionShort: Pick an image and classify the scene into 1000 categories such as keyboard, mouse, pencil, and many animals.
Samples.Description: Pick an image and classify the scene into 1000 categories such as keyboard, mouse, pencil, and many animals. Many more models can be tested with this sample by building the Windows ML Samples Gallery App from source from the project GitHub. Select an image to classify.

Samples.Title: Image Effects
Samples.DescriptionShort: Pick an image and apply a variety of effects powered by Windows ML like Blur, Sharpen, Contrast, and many more.
Samples.Description: Pick an image and apply a variety of effects powered by Windows ML like Blur, Sharpen, Contrast, and many more.

Samples.Title: Batched Inputs
Samples.DescriptionShort: Perform infererence over multiple inputs at once to increase runtime performance.
Samples.Description: Use this sample to compare inference runtime performace with and without batched inputs. 50 images will be passed through SqueezeNet for classification. Set a batch size and click Start Inference to compare. Note that in general batching makes a greater improvement on GPU than it does on CPU.

Samples.Title: OpenCV
Samples.DescriptionShort: The sample uses Windows ML to classify images that have been denoised natively using OpenCV.
Samples.Description: This sample demonstrates interop between Windows ML and OpenCV. The sample classifes images that have been denoised using OpenCV's medianBlur using the SqueezeNet model on Windows ML. Choose an image to get started.

Samples.Title: ImageSharp
Samples.DescriptionShort: The sample uses Windows ML to classify images that have been loaded by the managed ImageSharp library.
Samples.Description: The sample uses Windows ML to classify images that have been rotated by the managed ImageSharp library. Choose an image to get started.

Samples.Title: Encrypted Models
Samples.DescriptionShort: The sample shows how to use Windows ML to load encrypted models from embedded resources.
Samples.Description: The sample shows how to use Windows ML to load encrypted models from embedded resources. Enter the correct key to decrypt the model and classify the hummingbird.

Samples.Title: Adapter Selection
Samples.DescriptionShort: Select different adapters based on your power and performance needs.
Samples.Description: The sample showcases how to use Windows ML with different adapters that have tradeoffs between power and performance.

Samples.Title: Real-Time Inference
Samples.DescriptionShort: The sample shows how to use Windows ML to apply a model to a camera stream in realtime.
Samples.Description: The sample shows how to use Windows ML to apply a model to a camera stream in realtime. Select a style transfer model and it will be applied to the camera stream.
